t: Le Puzz - Jigsaw Puzzles
s: We’re Le Puzz and we love jigsaw puzzles! We collect them, we do them with friends and family, we give them away and trade them when we’re finished. We especially love collecting vintage puzzles from the 60s, 70s and 80s with an odd sense of humor.
